questiontext.text: From each of two normally distributed populations with equal variances a sample is drawn.______________. Sample 1: n = 17, mean = 27, sd = 12.18 Sample 2: n = 15, mean = 20, sd = 11.12. The pooled variance estimator takes the value 136.83. It is tested Whether the population averages are equal. The corresponding test size follows, if the null hypothesis is TRUE,

answer.text: A T distribution with 32 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: A T-distribution with 32 degrees of freedom: Incorrect

answer.text: A T distribution with 30 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: A T-division with 30 degrees of freedom: Correct

answer.text: An F-division with 16 and 14 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: An F-division with 16 and 14 degrees of freedom: Incorrect

answer.text: An F-division with 17 and 15 degrees of freedom

feedback.text: An F-division with 17 and 15 degrees of freedom: Incorrect
